main event: A civilian observer reported two metallic circular objects flying at high altitude near DeFuniak Springs, Florida.
interesting points: The objects were estimated to be 40 feet in diameter and were observed traveling at speeds greater than 1000 mph., One object made a sharp turn and descended rapidly toward the observer., The objects did not make any noise and had no visible exhaust trails., The sighting lasted for approximately 3-4 seconds., The observer used binoculars to observe the objects, indicating a clear line of sight.
